data.message: Please include a thumbs down and a confused emoticon. Those are the two I would use the most.

replies.message: Hi Dominique. Through community feedback, we've learned that people would like more ways to express themselves. This is why we've created Reactions. This feature gives people the ability to respond to a wide variety of posts, through the use of emotions. -Jordan

Facebook you didn't even read what I wrote .  I said two MORE emoticons would be nice - the thumbs down and one that looks confused.  I understand why you created them and your answer doesn't address my comment.
Hahaha their response would have been a time I could have used the thumbs down!
Colene McElhaney Solima - Exactly!  Lol!
I would like a dislike button to express myself Facebook
I understand from where Facebook came from by not having the 👎.  To avoid cyberbulling but they should allow the dislike to Pages not people at least.
Great idea!!!
I think Fb gives pre-selected answers
But imagine someone disliking selfies 😱
Jodi Condrey  I think you're right!
It's a bot
Anybody else having a problem using Reactions on a kindle fire?
Oh my. We wouldn't want to offend anyone!!! Ridiculous
I started having problems with Facebook in general on my Kindle Fire a few months ago so I use my phone now.  Anyway to answer your question I haven't tried it yet!  Lol!
Facebook can you say "AUTOMATED RESPONSE" ?!?! Lol

That auto response was a perfect portrayal of how Facebook totally ignores what people say.

How can the data mine so much, yet pay so little attention to our comments??

Play nice.  They actually do supply a link in several responses to submit your asks. That way they can collect all feedback and analyze and prioritize it when the next round of changes come around.  They need to be organized in determining if the majority want it. So launch the link and share your ideas with them.
Where's the thumbs down for their lame response?
Amy Cooper lol!
Facebook(null)
I would love to have it, but I don't know how to get it!
DianeAdele that's the whole point, they answered a question with nothing related to the thumbs down & I believe many of FB users would love one !
FacebookThumbs down
Kathy Madigan  thanks!  I forgot about tapping the face!
